iti57:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti57:2.3: The defilements of sensuality, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
iti57:3.1: “One who has ended the defilement of sensuality,
iti57:3.3: and whose desire to be reborn is finished—
iti57:3.6: having vanquished Māra and his mount.”
iti57:4.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
